Articles.Content:
I was doing the wikki campaign and am currently on "Age Of Satellites" http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Campaign:_Age_of_Satellites

and came to the mission SpySat. In it you need a sun synchronous orbit. Is this possible? Anything helps, thanks!

This kind of orbit is not possible in KSP, as it uses orbital precession to stay aligned with the Sun.

In KSP, Kerbin's gravitational field is perfectly even, so you can only simulate a Sun-synchronous orbit for a few orbits.
